title: Average weekly working hours in Sweden 2019 , by type of employment
yAxis: Average number of working hours per week
summary: This statistic shows the average annual salary in the netherlands in 2018 , in euros . It shows that the average employee , next to an annual salary of roughly 20,100 euros , also received an additional 4,600 euros in special payments . Together , the combined yearly salary in the netherlands was approximately 34,700 euros .
gold: The ordinary weekly working hours in Sweden are stated to equal 40 hours . However , the actual average reported weekly working hours in Sweden fluctuated between 30 and 30.9 hours per week during the period from 2009 to 2019 . In 2019 , an actual working week amounted to 30.2 hours on average .
